query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'ai_pipeline_metrics' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE();
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user cYPAHDVF1MZtM6S.6044338ada58 --database cwh3JmcrqYgAZTUAinEMzM --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'ai_pipeline_metrics' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE();
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE
id	int
stage	varchar
durationMs	int
success	tinyint
errorMessage	text
